data.title: Buy Tommy Davidson Tickets, Event Dates & Schedule, Seating Chart
data.meta_description: Get tickets to see Tommy Davidson’s live comedy show. Discover Amazing Seats And Ticket Prices With Our Interactive Seating Chart.
data.text:
Tommy Davidson Tour Tickets

See a king of comedy with Tommy Davidson tickets. The acclaimed entertainer is beloved for his charismatic personality and spot-on impersonations. He appeared as a regular on In Living Color during the 1990s, joining the ranks of Jim Carey and Jamie Foxx. His rise to fame started on the stand-up circuit in the late 80s, and his talent has taken him to the top. The comedian has performed as an opening or supporting act for the likes of Luther Vandross and Patti LaBelle, and his impressions of stars such as Sammy Davis Jr. and Michael Jackson have made him a must-see performer.

Alongside his side-up work, he has also appeared as an actor in films. From his first role in the 1991 movie Strictly Business to appearing in the 2023 western-themed comedy Outlaw Johnny Black, the artist has remained on the radar. Buy Tommy Davidson tickets from TicketSmarter right now and see him take over the stage in person. His television credits are also extensive, including guest spots on shows like Disney’s 2022 animated feature The Proud Family: Louder and Prouder, where he voiced the character Oscar Proud. The star also continues to take to the tour circuit, performing live at venues like Ontario Improv Comedy Club in Ontario, California.

Tommy Davidson Ticket Prices

Keep in mind that pricing for Tommy Davidson tour tickets varies from show to show. If you live in a larger city with a larger market, typically tickets will be more expensive. Sold-out shows and VIP tickets will be some of the most expensive items on the market.

How much are Tommy Davidson tickets?

Typically, Tommy Davidson ticket prices are in the range of $80 to $150. Pricing fluctuates depending on what city you want to see the comedian and if the show is high in demand. Cheap Tommy Davidson tickets start at $35 to $45. Skip the box office and order Tommy Davidson comedy tickets from the comfort of your home with TicketSmarter.

For Tommy Davidson upcoming stand-up comedy shows, the average price you’ll pay for a ticket is $87.44. Many of the comedian’s live shows have cheap Tommy Davidson tickets starting at $68.04 a ticket. Typically, the most you can expect to pay to attend their live shows is $217.08 a ticket. A ticket to Tommy Davidson next comedy show in Wilkes-Barre, PA, will cost you between $68.04 - $217.08.

Tommy Davidson Tour Dates & Event Schedule

Get your Tommy Davidson event tour tickets today so you don’t miss one of the top live comedy performers. Davidson has brought his comedy routine to venues like Yoshi’s, Martin Theatre and Chicago Improv. From small clubs to large arenas like Scope Arena, Tommy Davidson performs at a variety of venue sizes across the country. Davidson is currently on two tours with comedians: The Fabulously Funny Comedy Festival and April Fools Comedy Show. Check the Tommy Davidson event schedule to see if he is taking his improv to a city near you.

Prepare yourself for a night packed with sidesplitting laughter because Tommy Davidson is performing 1 comedy shows in 2024. Tommy Davidson is bringing their comedy act to Wilkes-Barre on October 18th, 2024 at 7:00pm. This laugh-out-load performance is taking place at the F.M. Kirby Center at 71 Public Square, Wilkes-Barre, PA. Tickets to this comedy act range from $68.04 - $217.08 a ticket. Get your Tommy Davidson tickets now because there are only 410 tickets available to see this popular comedian.

When do Tommy Davidson tickets go on sale?

Look at available Tommy Davidson tour dates in your city to see if he’s taking his impressions to an area near you. You don’t need to search the internet for a presale code, TicketSmarter already gives you early access! Sign up for our newsletter so you can stay up to date on all comedy events in your area.

Tommy Davidson Seating Chart

Davidson performs at a variety of different venue sizes depending on if he’s performing solo or with an ensemble of other comedians. From Hulu Theater at Madison Square Garden to Chicago Improv Comedy Club, Tommy Davidson takes his show to many different venues with different vibes. TicketSmarter can help you find the best seat for your budget. Use TicketSmarter’s interactive seating chart to select and sort tickets for the Tommy Davidson event you want to attend. To dodge being called out by Davidson who likes to banter with his audience, avoid sitting in the front row at some of his smaller shows.
